description:
The Straw Hats` new ship gets a name, and Franky shows off some of its special features as the gang goes sky high to avoid being sunk by the marines!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les avis de recherche circulent. Les connaissances dansent, le navire avance
Meguru Tehaisho! Kokyou wa Odoru Fune wa Susumu!
Wanted Posters Make It Around the World! Celebration in Their Hometowns As the Ship Moves Forward!
Знаменитые на весь мир! Реакция на родине
ملصقات المطلوبين تنتشر حول العالم! احتفالات في أوطانهم بينما تتقدّم السّفينة!
めぐる手配書! 故郷は踊る船は進む!
